segments.text: Good afternoon . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to make a deposit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which type of deposit do you prefer , time deposit or current deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okey . The interest rate for time deposit is higher . Could you tell me it's RIB deposit or currency deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it your first time to make a deposit here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The term of time deposit ranges from three months to five years , including three months , six months , one year , two years , three years and five years . How long would you like to keep your deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fill in this slip in ink , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Just a moment , please .
segments.speaker: S1
